title: Doctor Who
content: anyone here a doctor who fan?

title: Re: Doctor Who
content:
YES!

Especially the origionals; when I was four my mother let me watch all the videoes she made of it; back then the Daleks terrified me more than any of this modern crap.

Also, they had Vortisaurs; [[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vortisaur]en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vortisaur[/url]] a relation to our more famous blue species perhaps?A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

-Levellord

title: Re: Doctor Who
content:

title: Re: Doctor Who
content:

Nope. I have probably heard the name somewhere but I have never seen any episodes, I think.Eat your veggies!

title: Chow Dot Ro
content:
[hr]KeenRush Doctor.. Who? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]
Nope.
[hr][img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img] I daresay you'd find it quite intriguing if you saw it, KR.

I've only seen a few of the oldschool episodes and only the last half of the new series, and I vaguely remember something about a movie. I've been meaning to get my hands on some of the stuff I haven't seen. From what I have seen, though, I'm definitely a fan.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

title: Re: Chow Dot Ro
content: at the doctor who inside the tardis convention a few months ago, i actually got to be onstage with sylvester, colin & katy they were quite nice people, my seat number was drawn out of a hat i went into the draw to win a trip to london to see production of the 2006 series starring david tennatt i didn't win but at least i got to be onstage & had a good time
